metadata.name: Lutetia
metadata.description:
A new face of technology is emerging: Lutetia, named after the Latin name for Paris, is a fusion of AI, manual digital painting, and animation. It represents an evolution of the "Generation" series, which is a unique concept-driven series aimed at breathing life into a new generation of beings forever inscribed on the blockchain.

Lutetia ignites hope for progress and unity, capturing a unique and mysterious beauty by combining a plethora of digital art techniques.

Dimensions: 3840 x 5760  
Duration: 16 animated loop

Lutetia was part of the 'Oddly Satisfying' collection auctioned at Sotheby's in March 2023.
